accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Jazz Textile Collection, [Box #], Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: The Jazz Textile Collection contains t-shirts promoting jazz-related events and organizations. Included are t-shirts from the Jazz Institute of Chicago, Chicago Jazz Festival, and the International Association for Jazz Educators. Also included is a t-shirt documenting the 75th birthday celebration of Joe Segel, owner of Chicago-based club Jazz Showcase. There is also a t-shirt for the band Jesse Scinto and the Dignitaries. The t-shirts date from around the mid-1990s through 2001.
